name: Felix's Guaranteed Lucky Dice Store
description:
So I heard you were looking for a job.

It’s not that complicated. Here we sell lucky dice to superstitious folks. All of our dice have an average of their last few rolls. The higher the average, the luckier the die is.

Unlucky dice sell for a small discount, but lucky dice… 

Those sell for a fortune. 

But there’s a catch.

Here at FELIX’S GUARANTEED LUCKY DICE STORE we have a guarantee…

We prove to the customer the die can beat its average. If it does, they pay full price. If it doesn’t, we sell it for a dollar. 

*That’s really cheap for a lucky die!*

Use the mouse to control.

Made for GMTK Jam 2022.

Dice art by Aeynit
